Adding installation instructions for Debian/Ubuntu
Adding installation instructions for Debian/Ubuntu
Update copyright notice years.
Add copyright notices to files that don't have them.

Change license from MPL to Apache 2.0.

This makes more sense than the MPL (which was added late) because many files
already have an Apache notice at the start. In addition to me, both Lloyd
Hilaiel and Philippe M. Chiasson are okay with the license change.

use 303 See Other instead of 307 Temporary Redirect after logout

normalize style in logout-related functions

pass cookie data around as a unit

show normal 403 error for persona-idp mismatches

Seems like enough information for users, and slightly better for security. It
also seems like this is hard to do in Apache 2.4's new AAA framework.
rename to mod_authnz_persona everywhere (fixes #18)
update to latest reqwest (with explicit version!)
implement logout via XHR (POST "null" assertion, fixes #15)
use error UX instead of alert()
require POST method for login (see #10)

clean up unneccessary Require line handlers

These generic directives can be handled by other Apache modules. Less code!

let people through as the default authorization policy

set custom error response content for 401/403 errors
